Plot: In a parallel universe, young Lyra Belacqua journeys to the far North to save her best friend and other kidnapped children from terrible experiments by a mysterious organization.
Title: The Golden Compass
Actors: Nicole Kidman, Daniel Craig, Dakota Blue Richards, Ben Walker
tomatoConsensus: Without the bite or the controversy of the source material, The Golden Compass is reduced to impressive visuals overcompensating for lax storytelling.
